original_title: Five takeaways from a week of Trump’s Ukraine diplomacy — RT World News
article_summary: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer advised Ukrainian President Vladimir Zelensky on how to interact with US President Donald Trump during his visit to Washington, including suggesting he wear a suit jacket and express gratitude for military aid. Trump, in turn, urged Zelensky to show flexibility in negotiations with Russia to end the conflict between the two countries.</s>
